title: Original account lost
body:
Am I the only one who had an original account just disappear? And how is it that Riot Games is a company with no phone costumer service?
Can some one please tell me how can I actually talk to someone, NOT EMAIL but, physically talk to someone about my FIRST account?

replies.body:
Unfortunately, we don't have any sort of phone support or way you could physically talk to someone. Since account recoveries require a certain amount of thorough investigation and documentation, reaching our account specialists through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) is the quickest and most efficient way of getting assistance with this.

Let me know if you have any questions.
